meaningMnemonic: Your body <kanji>take</kanji>s nutrients into itself <kanji>in addition</kanji> to all the extra crap you eat. It's called your daily <vocabulary>intake</vocabulary>. And it gets all of those nutrients in your body through <vocabulary>absorption</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
